Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_COPY_FLD_ATTR;
:GLOBAL.SECRFRM := 'SOAIDEN';
EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:global.current_user,:global.secrfrm,'QUERY');
G$_RESET_GLOBAL;
--
 IF :GLOBAL.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LIST_VALUES_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:KEY_BLOCK.ID IS NULL),
 NULL, TRUE, TRUE);
--
 NEXT_FIELD ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:

NULL;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM STVTERM
 WHERE STVTERM_CODE = :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG ;
 ELSE
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_CODE_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Item.Name: HOLD_TERM_CODE
Item.Hint: Term;Press LIST for valid codes,COUNT QUERY HITS for student terms.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM STVTERM
 WHERE STVTERM_CODE = :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG ;
 ELSE
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_CODE_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NXTBLK
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE IS NULL THEN
 GO_FIELD ('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'ALLERR' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 IF :KEY_BLOCK.ID IS NULL THEN
 GO_FIELD('KEY_BLOCK.ID');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'ALLERR' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 END IF ;

 NEXT_BLOCK;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 --GO_BLOCK('RZVSAPR_VIEW');
 --GO_BLOCK('PRELIM');
 --EXECUTE_TRIGGER('PRELIMINARY_INFO');
 --G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 --:SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := '5' ;
 --GO_BLOCK('PROGRESS');
 --EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CALC_MAX_TIME_FRAME');
 --EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CALC_TERM_GPA');
 --EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CALC_CUM_GPA');
 --EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CALC_TERM_INCR');
 --EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CALC_CUM_INCR');
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := '0' ;
 --GO_BLOCK('STATUS');
 --EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CALC_STATUS');
 --GO_BLOCK('PREP');
 --EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CALC_PREP');
-- GO_BLOCK('RZVHIST');
-- GO_BLOCK('RYRPREC'); 15-APR-03 SPeterson
-- EXECUTE_QUERY; 15-APR-03 SPeterson
 GO_BLOCK('RORSAPR');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
-- GO_BLOCK('SFRSTCA');
-- EXECUTE_QUERY;

Trigger.Name: ALLERR
Trigger.TriggerText:
MESSAGE( '*ERROR* Must enter all Key Information.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_CHECK_VALUE (NOT (:PIDM IS NOT NULL
 AND :ID IS NOT NULL),
 '*ERROR* A valid ID must be entered before proceeding.',
 TRUE, TRUE);

Trigger.Name: KEY-NXTBLK
Trigger.TriggerText:
GO_BLOCK ('RORSAPR');
--- EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
-- G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
-- NEXT_BLOCK ;
-- EXECUTE_QUERY ;
-- :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
-- EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('DISABLE_KEYS');
--END IF;

--NEXT_BLOCK ;
--NULL;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
null;
/*
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SUM(SFRSTCR_CREDIT_HR), SUM(SFRSTCR_BILL_HR)
 FROM SFRSTCR
 WHERE SFRSTCR_TERM_CODE = :SFBETRM_TERM_CODE
 AND SFRSTCR_PIDM = :PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :SFRSTCR_CREDIT_HR, :SFRSTCR_BILL_HR ;
 END ;
--
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SUM(NVL(SFRSTCR_BILL_HR, 0))
 FROM SFRSTCR Z
 WHERE SFRSTCR_TERM_CODE = :SFBETRM_TERM_CODE
 AND SFRSTCR_PIDM = :PIDM
 AND EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM STVRSTS
 WHERE Z.SFRSTCR_RSTS_CODE = STVRSTS_CODE
 AND STVRSTS_INCL_SECT_ENRL = 'Y' )
 AND NOT EXISTS (
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM RORAUDT
 WHERE (RORAUDT_GMOD_CODE = Z.SFRSTCR_GMOD_CODE
 OR RORAUDT_RSTS_CODE = Z.SFRSTCR_RSTS_CODE)
 AND RORAUDT_AIDY_CODE = (
 SELECT STVTERM_FA_PROC_YR
 FROM STVTERM
 WHERE STVTERM_CODE = :SFBETRM_TERM_CODE )
 ) ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :DISPLAY_ADJ_HR ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND, NULL, TRUE);
 END ;
*/

ProgramUnit.Name: S$_VALID_ID
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE S$_VALID_ID(ID IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 PIDM IN OUT NUMBER,
 FULL_NAME IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 CONFID_IND IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 DCSD_IND IN OUT VARCHAR2)
IS
 ENTITY_IND VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
 CONFID_IND := '';
 DCSD_IND := '';

 
DECLARE
 CURSOR ID_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM,
 (SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ') || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' ||
 DECODE(SPRIDEN_MI,'','',SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_MI,1,1) || '. '),
 SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL;
 BEGIN
 OPEN ID_CURSOR ;
 FETCH ID_CURSOR INTO PIDM, FULL_NAME, ENTITY_IND;
 IF ID_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CHECK_FOR_PREVIOUS_ID ;
 ELSE
 GOTO CHECK_ENTITY;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
<< CHECK_FOR_PREVIOUS_ID >>
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PREV_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM,
 (SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ') || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' ||
 DECODE(SPRIDEN_MI,'','',SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_MI,1,1) || '. '),
 SPRIDEN_ID,
 SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM IN (
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND = 'I' )
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PREV_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PREV_CURSOR INTO PIDM, FULL_NAME, ID, ENTITY_IND;
 IF PREV_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* ID does not exist; press LIST for name/ID search.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('*WARNING* Previous ID replaced with current ID.' );
 END IF;
 END ;
--
<<CHECK_ENTITY>>
 IF ENTITY_IND = 'C' THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* ID identifies a company; must enter a person ID.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
--
<< CHECK_DECEASED >>
 DECLARE
 ALERT_BUT NUMBER;
 CURSOR DCSD_CURSOR IS
 SELECT '*DECEASED*'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_DEAD_IND = 'Y'
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = PIDM ;
 BEGIN 
 OPEN DCSD_CURSOR ;
 FETCH DCSD_CURSOR INTO DCSD_IND;
 IF DCSD_CURSOR%FOUND AND
 ID <> :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO THEN
 ALERT_BUT := G$_DISPLAY_ALERT(
 'S$_CAUTION_ALERT','Warning: This person is deceased.');
 END IF;
 END ;
--
<< CHECK_CONFID >>
 DECLARE
 ALERT_BUT NUMBER;
 CURSOR CONFID_CURSOR IS
 SELECT '*CONFIDENTIAL*'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_CONFID_IND IS NOT NULL
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN CONFID_CURSOR ;
 FETCH CONFID_CURSOR INTO CONFID_IND ;
 IF CONFID_CURSOR%FOUND AND
 ID <> :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO THEN
 ALERT_BUT := G$_DISPLAY_ALERT('S$_CAUTION_ALERT',
 'Warning: Information about this person is confidential.'); 
 END IF;
 END ;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL IS
BEGIN
 /* ************* TVI Audit Trail ***************
1. 04-MAY-01 SPeterson
 Built RZVSSAP from baseline SHACRSE. 
2. 11-OCT-01 SPeterson
 Corrected defect. RZVHIST data had been moved to RYRPREC. 
 Dropped RZVHIST block and replace with RYRPREC.
3. 10-OCT-01 SPeterson
 Added 'F' grade to the list of courses that are not considered 
 completed course work.
4. 17-OCT-01 SPeterson
 Added major Elementary Ed #4215 to transfer credit hour 
 section of max_time_frame calculations 
5. 17-OCT-01 SPeterson
 changed where clause on rorsapr block. removed term code limits 
6. 17-OCT-01 SPeterson
 added limits on last_sap_term/value last_sap_term is 
 now <= keyblock term code 
7. 17-OCT-01 SPeterson
 added addtional section to new sap decision trigger.
 Students that were new according to GPA but had pre-census
 drops were being calculated as new rather than considering
 the dropped courses 
8. 17-OCT-01 SPeterson
 rewrote prelim trigger to select major, credit hr info and 
 mtf hours section. Was using rzvprog view which was selecting 
 max(sgbstdn_term_code_eff) which might have been greater than 
 the keyblock.termcode. I abandoned rzvprog and went to straight 
 to sgbstdn and other relevant tables. 
9. 24-JUL-02 SPeterson 
 Converted to Forms6i
10. 15-APR-03 SPeterson
 *Precensus hours no longer being added into calculations.
 Replaced select "nvl(sum(ryrprec_precensus_credit_hrs),0)" with
 "select 0" in calc_max_time_frame, calc_term_incr, calc_cum_incr
 and calc_prep triggers.
11. 30-APR-03 SPeterson
 *With regards to repeat courses: course marked as 'E' are not
 completed course work. modified incremental triggers to exclude
 them from total credit hours completed.
12. 17-JUN-03 SPeterson
 *Discovered that calc_max_time_frame trigger was using wrong/old
 (rzvprog instead of rytcrrq) table to gather credit hour 
 requirements. Modified trigger to compare 
 :prelim.major_mtf_hours to :progress.max_time_frame_hours_attemp
13. 18-AUG-03 SPeterson
 *Missed the cum incremental change that should have been made
 in #11 above.
14. 22-JAN-04 SPeterson
 calc_term_gpa and calc_cum_gpa triggers quit functioning with move
 to Banner 6.x.changed term_gpa and cum_gpa datatype property from 
 char to number.
15. 15-DEC-04 TVI WR#594 SPeterson
 trigger progress.calc_max_time_frame - hard coded major codes for
 articulating programs needed another major added.
16. CNMCCWR# AMueller 22-FEB-2008
 Removed code that grabbed deleted history from WFRDELHIST; those hours will
 be ignored. Updated PROGRESS.CALC_MAX_TIME_FRAME, PROGRESS.CALC_TERM_INCR,
 PROGRESS.CALC_CUM_INCR, and PREP.CALC_PREP trigger to implement the change.
 Release changed from "6.1" to "6.1.1".
17. CNMCCWR#4486 LVarnedoe 30-MAR-2011
 Financial Aid requirements have changed and transferred hours now must be 
 counted for anyone who has turned in a transcript except those in the 
 Alternative Teacher Licensure Program. The tran_hours_ind used to get its information
 from RZVSAPR_MAJOR_ARTIC_IND. It now gets its information from RZVSAPR_ALT_TEACH_LIS_IND.
 So, I select the value of RZVSAPR_ALT_TEACH_LIS_IND into RZVSAPR_VIEW.TRAN_HOURS_IND.
 The logic seems a little bit backwards, but if the value of the indicator is N, meaning
 the student is not in the Alternative Teacher Licensure Program, then, Yes, the 
 tranferred hours need to be included in the MTF hours. If the value of the indicator is
 Y, meaning the student is in the Alternative Teacher Licensure Program, then, No, the
 transferred hours should not be included in the MTF hours.
 */
 NULL; 
END;

Trigger.Name: INVALID_CODE_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
MESSAGE(
'*ERROR* Invalid code; press LIST for valid codes.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
NULL ;
 MESSAGE( '*ERROR* Invalid function; press SHOW KEYS key' ||
 ' for valid functions.' ) ;

Trigger.Name: GLOBAL_COPY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:KEY_BLOCK.ID := :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO ;
--
 IF :ID IS NOT NULL THEN
 NEXT_FIELD ;
 PREVIOUS_FIELD ;
 END IF ;
--
 :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE := :GLOBAL.KEY_TERM ;
--
 IF :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 NEXT_FIELD ;
 PREVIOUS_FIELD ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: GET_TERM
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:PIDM IS NULL),
'*ERROR* A valid ID must be entered for this function.'
 , TRUE, TRUE);
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
-- CALL_FORM( 'SHQTERM', NO_HIDE, DO_REPLACE, QUERY_ONLY ) ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
-- G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,'SHQTERM','QUERY');
--
 :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE := :GLOBAL.VALUE ;

Trigger.Name: ENABLE_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);

Trigger.Name: KEY-CLRFRM
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('ENABLE_KEYS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 CLEAR_FORM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 R$_LOAD_FORM_HEADER;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CLOSE_WINDOWS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:GLOBAL.SECRSYS :='';
IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(USER_INTERFACE) = 'CHARMODE' THEN
-- SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('MAIN_WINDOW',POSITION, 252, 85); 15-APR-03 SPeterson
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('MAIN_WINDOW',POSITION, 0, 0);
ELSE
-- SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('MAIN_WINDOW',POSITION, 246, 68); 15-APR-03 SPeterson
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('MAIN_WINDOW',POSITION, 0, 0); 
END IF;
--
 G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY ;
 R$_LOAD_FORM_HEADER;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
 G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY;
--
